basics.name: Igor Zoriy
basics.label: JavaScript/Frontend Developer
basics.summary: My passion is creating web sites and applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS and other technologies related to web. I prefer to write testable, maintainable and clean code. I try to make informed decisions in my work. I have more than 12 years experience in software development including 9 years in web development. Last 5 year I'm focused on modern frontend technologies. My backend's background gives me full understanding of whole development process. I keep my mind opened for new technologies and I try to be familiar with web development trends. I work remotely about 5 years and know how to organize myself for productive work.

work.summary: Working as Frontend Developer in Client Experience team I'm trying to make our parts of Upwork more useful, functional and responsive for each Upwork client.
As Senior Frontend Developer I have wide range of responsibilities: design, development, maintenance, code review and team's consulting.
highlights: Created the mobile version of the shop
Integrated several awesome frontend tools for accelerating and simplifying development process
Participated in the creation of the deployment system for production and staging servers
Made a global refactoring for the frontend part for the desktop version of the shop
Improved site's speed and performance optimization
Integrated several 3rd party API for marketing/ecommerce

work.summary: Working as Full Stack Developer in NextLOVE team and as Frontend Developer in VictoriaMilan team.
highlights: Participated in the development of NextLOVE
Accelerated development process using Grunt and BrowserSync
Developed live chat for NextLOVE using Node.js
Developed frontend part of the live chat for VictoriaMilan

work.summary: Developing and consulting web sites and services
Developing company products and technical leading development team.
Developing web sites and services using PHP, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
